00002 extern ULONG mask_bits[], bitbuf;
00003 extern UCHAR *indata, bitcount;
00004 
00005 #define GETBITS(n) ((USHORT)(bitbuf >> (bitcount-(n))))
00006 #define DROPBITS(n) {bitbuf &= mask_bits[bitcount-=(n)]; while (bitcount<16) {bitbuf = (bitbuf << 8) | *indata++;  bitcount += 8;}}
